item.title: Looking beyond austerity: the future of employment law in the EU
item.description: Professor Catherine Barnard, Trinity College Cambridge Contrary to critics, the EU social model (ESM) is not dead, argues Professor Barnard. Although facing significant challenges, the ESM has historically demonstrated a capacity for renewal. This post explores potential future directions for the model. While some believe a Social Union is necessary for Europe, this post focuses on a potentially more agreeable agenda for the EU-28, particularly in the area of employment law.
